meanings.definition: To narrate or describe in detail.
meanings.sent1: Grandma loves to recite stories from her childhood to us.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide will recite the history of this ancient castle.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to recite a tale of adventure with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The old tree seemed to recite the passage of time with its gnarled branches.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting seemed to recite a story of love and loss.

meanings.definition: To perform or deliver a recitation.
meanings.sent1: The students will recite their poems at the school assembly.
meanings.sent2: The actor will recite a famous monologue in tonight's performance.
